Name.value: Ghussak - Almost No Trading Scavenge Only

Description.value: Traders will mainly just buy now, they have just a few items and take a very long time to update their inventory. The idea is to make the player not prefer building their home near a trader, and to find new items by luck while exploring the world. Traders are mainly good for radiant quests now. Vending machines wont be refilled as who did that is a zombie now.
